name: Feyward Tree
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but canâ€™t speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The feyward tree makes two Razor-Leafed Branch attacks.

actions.name: Razor-Leafed Branch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.

actions.name: Flaying Leaves (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The feyward tree launches a barrage of razor-sharp cold iron leaves from its branches. Each creature within 20 feet of the tree must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Aversion to Cold
special_abilities.desc: If the feyward tree takes cold damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and its speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: The feyward tree doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Enchanted Leaves
special_abilities.desc: The feyward tree's Razor-Leafed Branch attacks are magical. When the tree hits with its Razor-Leafed Branch, the branch deals an extra 9 (2d8) force damage (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The feyward tree is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Lightning Absorption
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the feyward tree is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hp equal to the lightning damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The feyward tree has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Warden's Reach
special_abilities.desc: A creature within 15 feet of a feyward tree that moves away from it provokes an opportunity attack even if the creature takes the Disengage action.
